availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, judge. Kentucky native. Married Lou Ann Mullins Haggard. Father of Rodney Haggard, and Martha M. Haggard. Farmer in Clark County in 1850. Presiding Judge of the Clark County Court in Winchester, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of Mt. Olive Baptist Church in Clark County.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District No. 2, p. 53; Winchester Democrat, Dec. 24, 1895; Kathryn Owen, Old Graveyards in Clark County, Kentucky (New Orleans: Polyanthos), 57.
